summary: An FBI email from February 15, 2021, providing situational awareness about a private investigator contacting the FBI on behalf of a victim in the Epstein/Maxwell case. The email notes the investigator's history with high-profile cases and mentions pending civil litigation.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the investigation referenced in the email's subject line.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Co-subject of the investigation referenced in the email's subject line alongside Epstein.

persons.name: OJ Simpson
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the high-profile cases the private investigator has been involved with in the past.

persons.name: William Kennedy Smith
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the high-profile cases the private investigator has been involved with in the past.

persons.name: Casey Anthony
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the high-profile cases the private investigator has been involved with in the past.

connections.description: Linked together as the subjects of the same FBI investigation mentioned in the email.

events.title: Private investigator contacts FBI
events.description: A private investigator, on behalf of a victim in the Epstein/Maxwell case, contacts an FBI agent via a personal cell phone.

keyFacts: A private investigator contacted the FBI on behalf of a victim in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation in February 2021.
The private investigator has a history of involvement in other high-profile cases including OJ Simpson, William Kennedy Smith, and Casey Anthony.
The email mentions that the victim and others have pending civil litigation related to the case.
The communication was for 'situational awareness' within the FBI regarding the ongoing investigation.
